name: Pactsworn Pathclearer
description:
End Phase: Gain 1 level of Indwelling. If Indwelling Level is at least 8, decrease the Indwelling level by 6.
Indwelling grants the following effects based on its level:
If equal to or greater than 2: Physical DMG dealt is converted to Electro DMG;
If equal to or greater than 4: DMG dealt +2.
descriptionraw:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Gain 1 level of Indwelling. If Indwelling Level is at least 8, decrease the Indwelling level by 6.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Indwelling grants the following effects based on its level</color>:
If equal to or greater than 2: $[K100] dealt is converted to $[K104];
If equal to or greater than 4: DMG dealt +2.

If equal to or greater than 4: DMG dealt +2.
